title: FS: T213-2 Mathewson and T201 Gasper/Clarke
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: T213-2 Mathewson and T201 Gasper/Clarke
posts.post_content:
Selling my T213 type 2 Christy Mathewson. Graded PSA 1, due to surface wrinkles.  Presents very nice for the grade, especially in hand.  Asking [strike]$435[/strike] sold.  I accept   PayPal friends and family or regular.  Price is net to  me, so please add  3%  for regular  PayPal.   Shipping is on me for  orders over $100, otherwise please add $3.00.  Scans available on    request.


I also have the following card:

T201 Mecca Double Folder, Gaspar/Clarke, raw, good- $40


PM, or e-mail with questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
